name: Missile Blaster
description:
Have fun blasting at an endless wave of missiles in this fast-paced, addictive, super juicy game!

Click to shoot! Try to beat your own highscore! The higher your combo, the higher your score multiplier!

Made for the first Extra Credits Game Jam
Theme: Awesomeness per Second

 Controls:
Mouse to aim, left mouse button to shoot.

Credits:
Made by : Seet (Me)
Music: Ryan Tan
